item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Aqeel Anwar, a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at NVIDIA, where I work on advancing the perception systems that power autonomous vehicles.

item.title: Travel
item.description: Travel has always been a passion of mine — a way to explore new cultures, challenge perspectives, and collect stories along the way.
